attributes.action: Stop Rape Victims underwear being used to defend an alleged Perpetrator in Court
attributes.background: In a recent trial in Dublin a 27 year old male was aqquited of raping a 17 year old female on the basis that her see through underwear somehow indicated she was ‘open to being with someone’. This is ‘victims blaming’ and is wrong. I feel the barrister was further abusing the female in this case.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the law and courts in Ireland.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/227191
